verbs.description: NPR and PBS " conservative " analyst David Brooks [V: was] steaming mad about anyone on Team Trump using biblical analogies about illegal immigration as they separate illegal - immigrant parents from their children after they cross the border . " Of course in the Bible it says be cruel to the refugee , " sneered Brooks on NPR 's All Things Considered . He called the Bible quoting
